thread.title: Liverpool squad revealed for Arsenal clash ahead of Premier League showdown
thread.title_full: Liverpool squad revealed for Arsenal clash ahead of Premier League showdown

author: Mirror Football
title: Liverpool squad revealed for Arsenal clash ahead of Premier League showdown
text:
Sport Liverpool squad revealed for Arsenal clash ahead of Premier League showdown Dejan Lovren is back in training for the Reds after a knee injury but Jordan Henderson will miss out   'I'm Not A Clown' - Klopp On Changing Mood At LFCCapture Share this video Get Liverpool     
Liverpool defender Dejan Lovren is in contention for the visit of Arsenal. 
The centre-back has been sidelined for almost five weeks with a knee injury but has returned to full training. 
Striker Daniel Sturridge, having recovered from a virus, is out for at least another week with a hip muscle strain. 
Liverpool will definitely be without skipper Jordan Henderson for the clash at Anfield. Klopp speaks to his players (Photo: Getty) 
"Jordan is too soon for sure," said Klopp. 
"Dejan we will see. He trained yesterday, now we have to see how he reacts on this." 
Liverpool provisional squad: Mignolet, Clyne, Lovren, Matip, Milner, Can, Wijnaldum, Lallana, Mane, Firmino, Coutinho, Karius, Trent-Alexander, Klavan, Moreno, Lucas, Stewart, Origi, Woodburn. 
Arsenal provisional squad: Cech, Ospina, Martinez, Bellerin, Holding, Gabriel, Mertesacker, Koscielny, Mustafi, Monreal, Gibbs, Maitland-Niles, Coquelin, Xhaka, Ramsey, Oxlade-Chamberlain, Ozil, Walcott, Reine-Adelaide, Iwobi, Perez, Sanchez, Giroud. poll loading Who will win on Saturday? 1000+ VOTES SO FAR
